sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>boat</radical> will have at least one <radical>weapon</radical>, <kanji>generally</kanji>.
meaningInfo: In general, you can assume a boat will have a weapon, but not all of them will.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Generally</kanji> a boat with a weapon will be owned by <reading>Han</reading> (<ja>はん</ja>) Solo.
readingInfo: So of all the boats out there, generally all of them have weapons, and generally Han Solo will be on one.
